# WidgetFamily.accessoryCorner

**Case**

A widget-based complication in the corner of a watch face in watchOS.

## Declaration

```swift
case accessoryCorner
```

## Accessing accessory families

- **WidgetFamily.accessoryCircular**: A circular widget.
- **WidgetFamily.accessoryRectangular**: A rectangular widget.
- **WidgetFamily.accessoryInline**: A flat widget that contains a single row of text and an optional image.
